#labels Featured
*_1. Click on "Force.com Platform", and select "AppExchange" option._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install1.JPG

*_2. On the "Find Apps" section, write "Projectforce" and press the Enter key. _*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/install2.jpg

*_3. Click on "ProjectForce Beta" link._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install3.jpg

*_4. Click on "Get It Now"._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install4.jpg

*_5. Choose "Production" option, and click "OK"._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install5.jpg

*_6. Enter your UserName, Password and click on "Login" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install6.jpg

*_7. Check "I have read and agree..." option._*

*_8. Click on "Install" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install7.jpg

*_9. Enter your password, and click on "Submit" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install8.jpg

*_10. Click on "Continue" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install9.jpg

*_11. Click on "Next" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install10.jpg

*_12. Select "Grant access to all users" option, and click on "Next" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install11.jpg

*_13. Check "Ignore Apex test..." and click on "Install" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install12.jpg

*_14. Click on "Setup" link at the top of the page._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install13.jpg

*_15. On App Setup section, click on "Create" option._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install14.jpg

*_16. Click on "Objects" option._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install15.jpg

*_17. Scroll down the page._*

*_18. Click on the "Override" link which is next to "Projects Tab"_*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install16.jpg

*_19. Select "Visualforce Page" option._*

*_20. Select "ProjectOverview'['ProjectOverview']'" option._*

*_21. Click on "Save" button._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install17.jpg

*_22. Select "Projectforce" option._*

http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install18.jpg



http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/installation/Install19.jpg
